about_the_game:
Play Drift Racing Rally and leave your skid marks on the asphalt! Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.
Drive you car over ramps to fly and flip you car in air.

Easy to control and fun to play thanks to an innovative drift Gameplay.
Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing.

BEWARE the danger of addiction! You may not want to quit & play for hours. Taking a quick break every 40 minutes is strongly advised.

Download this game to feel the joy of racing and drifting!!
detailed_description:
Play Drift Racing Rally and leave your skid marks on the asphalt! Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.
Drive you car over ramps to fly and flip you car in air.

Easy to control and fun to play thanks to an innovative drift Gameplay.
Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing.

BEWARE the danger of addiction! You may not want to quit & play for hours. Taking a quick break every 40 minutes is strongly advised.

Download this game to feel the joy of racing and drifting!!
developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: `

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Drift Racing Rally

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
